    • Method Detail

      • getRadioSet

        @PostMapping(value="/data")
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.ArrayList<RadioStation> getRadioSet(@RequestBody
                                                                                                  org.json.simple.JSONObject object)
                                                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        This method filters the RadioStation data set with a POST request containing the necessary parameters which are put in a JSONObject class object. The attributes in the JSONObject class object must be coherent with the class FieldParamAll, otherwise, will be returned an exception. If some attributes are missing or wrong, will be returned a JSONObject object containing info about the error.
        Parameters:
        object - Object that will contain parameters for the data filter.
        Returns:
        Returns a filtered ArrayList of RadioStation Objects.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getRadioSet

        @GetMapping(value="/data")
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.ArrayList<RadioStation> getRadioSet()
                                                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        This method allows to get after a GET request a ArrayList of RadioStation objects containing the entire Data set.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of RadioStation class objects containing the parsed data set.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

 @ResponseBody

      • getMathStats

        @RequestMapping(value="/stats")
public java.lang.Object getMathStats(@RequestParam(value="fieldName")
                                                                      java.lang.String fieldName)
        This method allows to get math stats for a certain field name (fieldName) after a GET request.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The name of the field we want to get stats from
        Returns:
        Object containing all the math stats for the field

      • getFilteredMathStats

        @PostMapping(value="/stats")
public java.lang.Object getFilteredMathStats(@RequestBody
                                                                           org.json.simple.JSONObject object)
                                                                    throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        This method filters the RadioStation data set a with a POST request containing the necessary parameters which are put in a JSONObject class object.
        Parameters:
        object - The object that will contain the parameters.
        Returns:
        Object containing the stats calculated from the filtered data set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException

      • getWordsStats

        @RequestMapping(value="/wordstats")
public java.lang.Object getWordsStats(@RequestParam(value="word")
                                                                           java.lang.String word)
                                                                    throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                                           java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                           java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        This method calculates all the recurrences of word which contain, or equal, a certain word passed with a GET request.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Object containing the word stats.
